General.Name: Chaintech Technology Corp
General.Description: Chaintech Technology Corporation engages in the manufacturing and sale of products related to motherboards, display cards, and computer peripherals in Mainland China and Taiwan. It offers graphic cards; mainboards based on Intel and AMD chipsets; all-in-one gaming machine; AI servers; and AI development management platform. The company was formerly known as Walton Chaintech Corporation and changed its name to Chaintech Technology Corporation in 2013. Chaintech Technology Corporation was founded in 1986 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 48-3, Minquan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23141
